articles.title: SJVN aims to add ₹4,000 crore in revenue over next two financial years - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Arun 3 project, which SJVN is constructing in Nepal will be commissioned in February 2025. That project will add another ₹1,200 crore to the company's revenue, according to its CMD.
